org.openscience.cdk
Class Association

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.cdk.ChemObject
      org.openscience.cdk.ElectronContainer
          org.openscience.cdk.Association
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, IChemObject, IElectronContainer
@TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.AssociationTest")
public class Association
extends ElectronContainer
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

Base class for storing interactions like hydrogen bonds and ionic interactions. The ElectronContainer contains zero electrons by default.

See Also:
Serialized Form
Keywords:
orbital, association, bond
Belongs to CDK module:
extra
